apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss emoji with a medium-dark skin tone features a pair of lips puckered in a warm, affectionate gesture, rendered with a soft, rosy hue. The glossy finish and subtle highlights on Apple's design lend a smooth, inviting texture to the lips, embodying tenderness and intimacy. This emoji is frequently used to convey affection, express gratitude, or send a loving farewell in messages, adding a personal and heartfelt touch.
